snippet.title: Echo Night 2 (PS1) Trailer Intro
snippet.description: Echo Night 2 (From Software, Inc.) was released only in Japan in 1999.  The game is built on the premise of helping ghosts rather than exorcising them to get through a haunted Western manor to find your missing girlfriend.  The entire Echo Night series is hard to categorize.  The game focuses on puzzle solving and storytelling, and the stories can be described as bittersweet.
